i18n_condition_occur_received: The condition occurs immediately after the message is sent to Profiles.
i18n_condition_not_occur_received: The condition is considered not to occur if the message has been sent but fails; or after a waiting period, the system still does not receive the result of sending the message.
i18n_description_time_wait_received: Waiting period only applies in case the system does not receive the result of sending the message.
i18n_condition_occur_open: The condition occurs immediately if Profiles open the message.
i18n_condition_not_occur_open: The condition is considered not to occur if Profiles did not receive the message; or after a waiting period, Profiles received but did not open the message.
i18n_description_time_wait_open: Waiting period only applies in case the system does not recognize Profiles opening to view the message after it has been received.
i18n_condition_occur_click_link: The Condition occurs immediately if Profiles click any link in the message. Only considered on the followed links.
i18n_condition_not_occur_click_link: The condition is considered not to occur if Profiles did not receive the message; or after a waiting period, Profiles received but did not click any link in the message. Only considered on the followed links.
i18n_description_time_wait_click_link: Waiting period only applies in case the system does not recognize Profiles clicking the link after receiving the message. Only considered on the followed links.
i18n_condition_occur_transaction: The condition occurs immediately after Profiles met spending condition.
i18n_condition_not_occur_transaction: The condition is considered non-existent. Profiles did not receive the message; or after a waiting period, Profiles received the message but met the spend condition.
i18n_description_time_wait_transaction: The waiting period only applies in case the system does not recognize Profiles that satisfy the spending conditions after receiving the message.
i18n_condition_occur_filter: The condition occurs if Profiles satisfy the selected Filter.
i18n_condition_not_occur_filter: The condition is considered not to occur if Profiles do not satisfy the selected Filter.
i18n_condition_occur_trigger: The condition occurs immediately when Profiles satisfy the Filter and generate the selected Event.
i18n_condition_not_occur_trigger: The condition is considered not to occur if, after a waiting period, Profiles does not generate the selected Event whether or not the Filter is satisfied.
i18n_condition_occur_interaction_convert: The condition occurs immediately if Profiles click on CTA areas in the landing page, considering only the landing page links tracked in the message.
i18n_condition_not_occur_interaction_con: The condition is considered not to occur if Profiles did not receive the message; or after a waiting period, Profiles received but did not click on the CTA areas in the landing page. Considering only the landing page links tracked in the message.
i18n_description_time_wait_interaction_c: The waiting period only applies in case the system does not recognize Profiles clicking on CTA areas in the landing page after receiving the message. Considering only the landing page links tracked in the message.
i18n_condition_occur_interaction_convert: The condition occurs immediately if Profiles use the voucher attached to the message (The nearest message block is above this block in the workflow).
i18n_condition_not_occur_interaction_con: The condition is considered not to occur if Profiles did not receive the message; or after a waiting period, Profiles received the message but did not use the voucher attached to the message (The nearest message block is above this block in the workflow).
i18n_description_time_wait_interaction_c: Wating period only applies in case the system does not recognize Profiles using the voucher given after receiving the message.
i18n_condition_occur_interaction_convert: The condition occurs immediately after Profiles purchases the selected product.
i18n_condition_not_occur_interaction_con: The condition is considered not occur if Profiles did not receive the message; or after a waiting period, Profiles received the message but did not purchase the selected product.
i18n_description_time_wait_interaction_c: Waiting period only applies in case the system does not recognize the Profiles of purchasing the selected product after receiving the message.

The condition is considered not to occur if the profile does not receive the marketing message; or after a waiting period, the profile has been received but not opened to view the marketing message.
Note: The waiting period only applies in case the system does not recognize the open profile. after receiving the marketing message.

i18n_marketing_condition_not_occur_click:
The condition is considered not to occur if the profile does not receive the marketing message; or after a waiting period, the profile received the message but did not click any links in the marketing message.
Note: The waiting period only applies in the case of the system does not recognize the profile that clicks the link after receiving the marketing message.
Only the links that are being tracked
i18n_marketing_condition_occur_fill_form: The condition occurs immediately after the Profile clicks the CTA in the landing page.
i18n_marketing_condition_not_occur_fill_:
The condition is considered not to occur if the Profile does not receive the marketing message; or after a waiting period, Profile received the message but did not click on the CTA in the landing page attached to the marketing message.
Note: The waiting period applies only in case the system does not recognize the Profile click on the CTA in the landing page after receiving the marketing message.
i18n_marketing_condition_occur_use_vouch: The condition occurs immediately after the Profile uses the voucher attached in the Marketing message.
i18n_marketing_condition_not_occur_use_v:
The condition is considerd not to occur if the Profile does not receive the marketing message; or after a waiting period, Profile received the message but did not use the voucher attached to the marketing message.
Note: The waiting period only applies in case the system does not record the Profile using the gift voucher after receiving the marketing message.
i18n_marketing_condition_occur_purchase: Condition occurs immediately after Profile purchases one of the selected products.
i18n_marketing_condition_not_occur_purch:
The condition is considered not to occur if the Profile does not receive the marketing message; or after a waiting period, Profile received the message but did not purchase one of the selected products.
Note: Waiting period only applies in case the system does not recognize the Profile of purchasing one of the selected products after receiving the marketing message.
i18n_marketing_condition_occur_fill_vouc: Condition occurs immediately after the customer obtains or receives the voucher code
i18n_marketing_condition_not_occur_fill_: The condition is considered not to occur if, after a waiting period, the customer does not collect or receive the voucher code.
i18n_marketing_condition_occur_spent: The condition occurs immediately after the Profile meets the spending condition.
i18n_marketing_condition_not_occur_spent:
The condition is considerd not to occur if the Profile does not receive the marketing message; or after a waiting period, Profile received the message but did not satisfy the spend condition.
Note: The waiting period only applies in case the system does not recognize the Profile satisfying the spending conditions after receiving the marketing message.

i18n_use_1_point_tooltip:
- Customers accumulate Points.
- Points are used to qualify membership tier or redeem vouchers, purchase products/services (deducted on invoice value).
- Membership tier will change (upgrade/downgrade) depending on the increase/decrease of Points.
i18n_use_2_point: Use two scoring systems (called Ranking point and consumption points)
i18n_use_2_point_tooltip:
- Customer accumulates Ranking Points and Consumption Points at the same time.
- Rating points are used to qualify membership tier. Consumption points are used to redeem vouchers, buy products/services (deduct on invoice value).
- Membership tier will change (upgrade/downgrade) depending on the increase/decrease of ranking points
i18n_point_expire_after_point_add: Points expire after a period of time since points are awarded.
i18n_point_expire_after_point_add_noti:
The time limit is calculated separately for each time of adding points to the customer. E.g. The point period is 12 months.
- On 01/01/N, customer A gets 5 points => By 23:59 on 31/12/N, these 5 points will expire and be deducted.
- On 02/01/N, customer A gets 3 points => By 23:59 on 01/01/N+1, these 3 points will expire and be deducted.
i18n_point_expire_fix: All points expire at a fixed time every year.
i18n_point_expire_fix_noti: All customer points will expire annually at 23:59 of the selected date.
i18n_point_cycle: Points accumulate periodically. At the end of the cycle, the accumulated points in that cycle will expire immediately.
i18n_point_cycle_noti:
For example, the point accumulation cycle is specified from January 1st to the end of December 31th every year.
- From 00:00 on 01/01/N to 23:59 on 31/12/N, customers accumulate points in cycle 1.
- Until 23:59 on 31/12/N, points which customer accumulated in cycle 1 will expire and be deducted.
- At 00:00 on 01/01/N+1, customers will switch to accumulate points in cycle 2.
i18n_point_cycle_after: Points accumulate periodically. After a period of time has elapsed since the end of the cycle, the points accumulated in that cycle will expire.
i18n_point_cycle_after_noti:
For example, the point accumulation cycle is specified from January 1st to the end of December 31th every year. Points accumulated in a cycle will expire 1 month from the end of that cycle.
- From 00:00 on 01/01/N to 23:59 on 31/12/N, customers accumulate Points in cycle 1.
- Until 00:00 on 01/01/N+1, customers switch to accumulate points in cycle 2.
- Until 23:59 on 31/01/N+1 customer's accumulated points in cycle 1 will expire and be deducted.
i18n_point_cycle_after_from: Points accumulated in the previous cycle will expire on

Only ONE default Sales Pipeline at a time.

In case of auto-generating deal:
- If there is no information about products that Profiles (Leads) are interested in, deal will be created and assigned according to the default Sales Pipeline.
- If the information is available, deal will be created and assigned according to Sales Pipeline with similar products.

i18n_tooltip_default_process_order:
Only 01 Default Sales Pipeline at a time.
Deals can be created manually or automatically.
In case of auto-generating Deals:
- If there is no information about Products that Profiles (Leads) are interested in, Deals will be created and assigned according to the Default Sales Pipeline.
- If there is available information, Deal will be created and assigned according to the Sales Pipeline with the corresponding product.
